sentences.english: Was Zhang Yan's injury compensation paid by you separately?
sentences.chinese: 張豔的工傷補償金是你單獨支付的嗎？

sentences.english: 3 employee injury, according to my post salary 100%.
sentences.chinese: 3員工工傷期間，按本人崗位工資100%計發。
擴大了工傷保險適用範圍。

sentences.english: As a day laborer, he had no health or disability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 身爲臨時工的王明志沒有醫療或工傷保險。

sentences.english: Work-related accidents steadily increased from 1990 to 2002.
sentences.chinese: 自1990年開始，工傷事故數目每年穩步增長。

sentences.english: Accidents of crane machines account for a large percentage in the accidents of metallurgical industry.
sentences.chinese: 起重機械事故在冶金企業工傷事故中佔很大的比例。

sentences.english: The chapter two analyses damage compensation system of industrial injury accident.
sentences.chinese: 第二章對工傷事故損害賠償制度進行了理論分析。

sentences.english: Money pay to the family of someone who dies in an accident at work.
sentences.chinese: 向因工傷事故死亡者家庭所付的錢。

sentences.english: There is currently no legislation covering either Employers' Liability or Workers' Compensation insurance in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 在伊拉克，目前還沒有法律涵蓋僱主責任或工傷保險。

sentences.english: She was badly injured in an accident during the work.
sentences.chinese: 她在一次工傷事故中受了重傷。

sentences.english: However, the first work-related injury caused my left foot swollen while the second injury caused me a right foot sprain.
sentences.chinese: 但第一次工傷造成左腳腫脹，第二次只有右腳扭傷。

sentences.english: She was injured badly in an accident during the work.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次工傷事故中受了重傷。

sentences.english: He was injured badly in an accident during the work.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次工傷事故中受了重傷。

sentences.english: Are you unable to work because of an injury or illness?
sentences.chinese: 你不能工作是因爲工傷或疾病嗎？

sentences.english: The employing units of no payment, from inside fund of inductrial injury insurance such payment.
sentences.chinese: 用人單位不支付的，從工傷保險基金中先行支付。

sentences.english: Few work-related accidents took place in this workshop last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年該車間很少發生工傷事故。

definition: to be transferred to another post/to post away
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
to get out of trouble/to escape from danger/a danger appears/threatened by danger
